definition: Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

sentences.english: The one metre border should be in a different colour from the rest of the matted area.
sentences.chinese: 比賽場邊界內一公尺，鋪上不同顏色的墊子。

sentences.english: Who would have a seat right next to the field and not come?
sentences.chinese: 誰會買了一張座位靠近比賽場的票卻不來呢？

sentences.english: Cheedleading squads perform during the breaks at basketball matches.
sentences.chinese: 籃球比賽場間休息時，啦啦隊活躍起來。

sentences.english: The game was played on vast walled and banked playing areas.
sentences.chinese: 比賽在寬闊有圍牆的比賽場巨型。

sentences.english: The cricket games will be held in the stadium of Guangdong University of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 板球比賽場位於廣東工業大學校園內。

sentences.english: The competition arena is badly in need of repairs.
sentences.chinese: 這個比賽場地急待修繕。

sentences.english: The judge shall dismiss from the ring any Pembroke Welsh Corgi that is excessively shy.
sentences.chinese: 裁判通常會將過分羞怯的賓波基犬請出比賽場地。

sentences.english: A small luxury 'life-style' exhibition center is being created adjacent to the polo tournament venue.
sentences.chinese: 在馬球比賽場地邊將會設置“時尚奢侈生活展”區域。

sentences.english: Cheering squad is always very lively in the interval of the basketball match.
sentences.chinese: 籃球比賽場間休息時，拉拉隊總是很活躍的。

sentences.english: Narrator: Froggy left the venue, he continuously hit, very sad.
sentences.chinese: 離開了比賽場地，他連續受到打擊，非常的傷心。

sentences.english: The Tseung Kwan O Sports Ground will be the arena with the most gold medals awarded.
sentences.chinese: 將軍澳運動場將是最多金牌誕生的比賽場地。

sentences.english: So world sauna tounament sets match field in Finland.
sentences.chinese: 所以世界桑拿錦標賽把比賽場地設在了芬蘭。

sentences.english: A golf course was converted into a cross-country course.
sentences.chinese: 一個高爾夫球場則被改裝成越野比賽場地。

sentences.english: But Brad and Angelina weren’t the only famous faces at the game.
sentences.chinese: 但是皮特和朱莉並非比賽場唯一的名人。
